#include <iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#define GETCHAR getchar
#define PUTCHAR putchar
using namespace std;
inline void writeInt(long long x) { if(x==-1) { PUTCHAR('-'); PUTCHAR('1'); PUTCHAR('\n'); } else { int i = 10; char buf[11]; // buf[10] = 0;
buf[10] = ' '; do { buf[--i] = x % 10 + '0'; x/= 10; }while(x); do { PUTCHAR(buf[i]); } while (buf[i++] != ' '); } }
inline void fastInput(long long &x) {
register int c = getchar();
x = 0;
int neg = 0;
for(; ((c<48 || c>57) && c != '-'); c = getchar());
if(c=='-') {
neg = 1;
c = getchar();
}
for(; c>47 && c<58 ; c = getchar()) {
x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;
}
if(neg)
x = -x;
}
long long  n,a,b,sa=0,sb=0;
int main() {
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	
	while(t--){
		sa=0,sb=0;
		fastInput(n);
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
			fastInput(a); fastInput(b);
			sa+=a; sb+=b;
		}
		writeInt(sa-sb);
		printf("\n");
	}
		return 0;
}
